summary: Hi Katie, I am sorry to bother you but I was wondering if you could do another Phan theory or just rant about Dan and Phil for a...
question: Hi Katie, I am sorry to bother you but I was wondering if you could do another Phan theory or just rant about Dan and Phil for a bit. My first day of 6th form went horrible, resulting on overflowing stress into a breakdown. ( lots of things went wrong, I am honestly not normally like this ). Thank you so much, you are a really lovely and kind person. 💚
answer:
oh my gosh i’m so so sorry b!!! take lots of deep breaths, drink water, i hope this helps dear! tomorrow is a new day, things will get better, i promise

alright. onto the positivity content here m8s. we gettin disney up in this bih

oooooo hello anon dear!!! i think this is a super super incredible analogy bc you’re so right? 

for most of his childhood dan felt pretty shitty, didn’t have a best friend, didn’t feel like he fit in - he did for a bit, when he was in theater, but that ended and he sort of felt forced into this life he didn’t really want but what else could he do? it was what was expected. 

and then he found youtube and all the people there, particularly prince charming phil, and youtube was sort of this impossible dream, like sure he’d love to make vids but come on, him? making vids? really? just unrealistic. 

until, after working his ass off at being the best stalker ever and wishing on a star or w.e, he got phil’s attention. he got to go to the damn ball and phil noticed him somehow and they clicked like. immediately. impossibly. none of it should’ve happened but a series of impossible circumstances made everything fall together almost like a miracle and he got to meet his prince charming except then the clock struck midnight.

and a whole slew of shit fell down around them bc nothing’s perfect and sometimes things turn into pumpkins and you just have to cope. but did that stop phil from doing everything in his power to ‘find’ dan and bring him back to himself? to help dan come out of this mindset he’d holed himself up in? not even for a second.

so phil pushed through and stood beside dan the whole damn way, and it probably sucked sometimes bc there were a lot of smelly feet involved (look i’m trying to stick with the analogy here okay) but like. they stuck it out. neither of them gave up hope that things would get better, and neither of them stopped working (even though dan got lost a bit, got stuck in a life he hated but couldn’t find his way out of) to make things better.

and fricken finally they found each other, for real, and they’re standing out on a stage every damn night grinning at the whole world bc they did it they figured it out and they found each other and made it and damn i’m fuckin emotional over it bc they really are the irl cinderella and prince charming of yt like idc what their relationship is or isn’t they are the definition of the original power couple okay

reblog.comment:
oh my gosh i’m so so sorry b!!! take lots of deep breaths, drink water, i hope this helps dear! tomorrow is a new day, things will get better, i promise

summary: oops my finger slipped
body:
oops my finger slipped

Phil took a deep breath as he looked into the mirror. He could tell he looked nervous, with panicked eyes and sweaty palms. But he hoped Dan wouldn’t notice. Otherwise everything would be ruined. He remembered telling Martyn what he was going to say and how Martyn had laughed. He felt a bit nervous at that but knew that in the end they’d just laugh at it.


He finally fixed his quiff one more time and left the bathroom, seeing Dan waiting outside on his phone. “Ready?”, Dan asked. Phil nodded with a forced smile. Dan rose an eyebrow at that, but brushed it off. Dan poked his cheek before walking away, toward the ice cream shop.


Phil rolled his eyes with a grin and followed his boyfriend. Boyfriend. Not soon. The ring in his pocket suddenly felt heavier. They ordered their ice cream and left the shop, Phil smiling at Dan as he licked his ice cream suggestively. Although he doubted Dan meant it to be like that. Dan turned and saw his smirk, looking confused for a second before scoffing and shoving him, “You horny spork.”, he grumbled.


Phil laughed, and they finally made it to the beach. “It’s so pretty…”


Phil smiled at Dan’s comment, knowing this was the perfect time. He led them over to the water, feeling the cooling water pool around his feet. “Hey do you want to find out your gay name?”


He grinned as he remembered the cheeky joke. “Gay name?”, Dan asked with his face scrunched up.


“Yeah, it’s your first name.”, he took a deep breath before getting to one knee and grabbing the box out of his pocket, “And my last name.”


Dan squealed, “Oh my god! First of all, yes of fucking course. Secondly, holy shit you cheeky asshole!”


Phil smirked and slid the ring onto Dan’s finger. Perfect. Dan was crying slightly, so Phil got back up and wrapped his arms around Dan’s waist. “Daniel Lester.”


“Oh shush… But yeah, it’s amazing.”

summary: Some Kind Of Folliful
title: Some Kind Of Folliful
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Q2j0x7

by danfanciesphil (thejigsawtimess)

Dan has one friend, and only because he was forced into it. Phil is loud, excitable, and irritatingly happy all of the time. He seems to find Dan’s perpetual attitude funny, and despite Dan’s best efforts to shun him and everyone else, wants to be around him all the time. That is, until Phil starts talking about Amanda Jones.

St Anthony’s Secondary is a school divided by class. Their town is split down the middle, quite literally, by a railroad that separates the affluent families from the destitute. Dan is on the very outskirts of the poor side. He has one friend, and no desire to make any more, nor to buy into the sickening popularity and wealth contest of his peers. He thought Phil felt the same. And then, out of the blue, Phil develops a worrying obsession with a girl from the other side. She embodies everything Dan hates; he tries to explain this to Phil, to no avail. As his obsession with Amanda grows, as does Dan’s loathing for her. Still, it shouldn’t bug Dan this much to see his friend pine some braindead bimbo relying on her boyfriend’s wallet. So why does it?

Words: 3056, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Louise Pentland, PJ Liguori, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Pining, Secret Crush, Edgelord!Dan, painter!phil, High School, Implied/Referenced Underage Prostitution, Humor, Childhood Trauma, Class Differences, Classism, Bigotry & Prejudice, some kind of wonderful, Smoking
